about_the_game:
A second moon appears in the sky.

Named the True Moon, its once dreaded blue hue eventually fades into the background of everyday life, and the public loses interest.

Three years later, in the city of Otsuna, Japan...

Ryou Hamura's dull life is interrupted by an invitation from a red-eyed girl named Izumi Kagura.

"I want you to fight with me."

On nights bathed in the True Moon's cerulean light, many strange incidents are occurring in Otsuna.

In the shadow of everyday life hides the source of the madness, the Light Hunters. To slay them, Ryou and his allies in the Astronomy Club, the Firefolk, begin to fight in the dead of night.

Features:

  • A Visual Novel / Dungeon Crawler RPG

  • Make Friends During the Day!

  • Explore Dungeons at Night!

  • Gorgeous Art!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: Ryou lives a dull life in Otsuna until a red-eyed girl named Izumi invites him to join her fight against the Light Hunters. When the True Moon rises, the Light Hunters descend upon the city, leaving chaos in their wake. Cloaked in the shadows of the night, this story of supernatural suspense begins.
